thread.title: Perfecto Yasay fails to hurdle appointment body
thread.title_full: Perfecto Yasay fails to hurdle appointment body

title: Perfecto Yasay fails to hurdle appointment body
text:
Perfecto Yasay fails to hurdle appointment body  05pm   is the first Cabinet secretary from the Duterte administration to be rejected by the Commission on Appointments. AP/Bullit Marquez, File photo 
MANILA, Philippines â€” The   voted to reject the appointment of   following his failure to disclose the status of his citizenship. 
Yasay is the first Cabinet member of the Duterte administration to be rejected by the CA after lying under oath. 
In an interview with radio dzMM Wednesday, Sen. Panfilo Lacson said that the CA firmly believes that Yasay acquired US citizenship. 
In his February 22 confirmation hearing, Yasay said that he never legally acquired an American citizenship. But in an interview with ANC's "Headstart" on Monday, the secretary said that he had an American passport. 
He insisted, however, that he was disqualified from acquiring US citizenship as he had the intent to abandon his residency in the US. 
At Wednesday's confirmation hearing,  Sato, a CA member, raised Yasay's withdrawal of his naturalization in the US only in June 2016, when the Duterte administration took over. The US confirmed the request in February 2017.   
Sato said that Yasay did not undergo the procedure to formally disavow his US citizenship prior to his appointment to the Department of Foreign Affairs. 
This is a developing story.
